name: Roberto Solis-Oba
content: Roberto Solis-Oba, The University of Western Ontario Roberto Solis-Oba Professor Department of Computer Science The University of Western Ontario London, Ontario, N6A 5B7 Canada Research Interests My main area of research is the design and analysis of algorithms. Most of my research has centered on the design of approximation algorithms. However, I am interested also in the design of efficient data structures, parallel algorithms, distributed algorithms, online algorithms, and randomized algorithms. Application areas from where most of the problems that I have studied come from are: networks, scheduling, packing problems, resource allocation, Computational Biology, and data mining. Publications A list of my publications can be found here Background I graduated from . . Purdue University under the supervision of I was a postdoctoral fellow at the . .
